title: Madhvacharya (film)
text:
Madhvacharya (1986) is a <a href="Kannada%20language">Kannada language</a> film directed by <a href="G.%20V.%20Iyer">G. V. Iyer</a>. The film is based on the life and teachings of the founder of the Tattvavada philosophy, <a href="Madhvacharya">Madhvacharya</a>. Ananthalakshmi Films produced this film and Theatrical Distributor was the distributor of the film. This film screened at 11th IFFI panorama. It won the National Award for Dr.<a href="M.%20Balamuralikrishna">M. Balamuralikrishna</a> as the Best Music Director.
Synopsis.
The film is based on life of Madhavacharya, A Vaishnavite Scholar.
